#ReadAllAboutIt

In the Press

We don’t like to blow our own trumpet, we let others do it for us.

Presswire Launch Release

[PRESSWIRE] London, UK – 1st March 2022 — The Pandimensionals, an NFT collection featuring a race of cherryade-fueled aliens from another dimension, is set to launch on 18 March.

Read the full story

Our founder PJ Cooper was asked to comment on the entry of Facebook and Twitter into the Metaverse.

Published on 21 Jan 2022: The Sun UK and Sun US

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”#000000″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#2e3857″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212529″ background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”99px|0px|69px|0px||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”2869″ global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”New standard of payments” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ text_font_size=”20px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|43px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s clean up your dimension

In return for supporting the Pandimensional NFTs we will donate 10% of our profits to charities that support and ensure a cleaner environment for our children. We are particularly supportive of charities that seek to clean our oceans and decrease the deforestation of the Amazon.

We’ll donate 10% to selected charities when each of our drops have been fully minted and announce which charities have received the donation. But we won’t stop there, every 6 months we will donate 10% of our royalties made on the secondary market.

The Pandimensionals is an NFT art collection of 4242 NFTs. Use your Pandimensional NFT as your profile picture on social media and stand out from the crowd. We’ve designed the Pandimensional NFTs to be representative of everyone, no matter your ethnicity, faith, gender or sexuality. If you’re looking for cool NFTs to use on your Twitter, Facebook or other social media account, you won’t find a better one than a Pandimensional NFT.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
